Up.Statement:
if not exists (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[w2_DefaultSetting]')) BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[w2_DefaultSetting] ( [shop_id] [nvarchar] (10) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [classification] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [init_data] [nvarchar] (MAX) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [date_created] [datetime] NOT NULL DEFAULT (getdate()), [date_changed] [datetime] NOT NULL DEFAULT (getdate()), [last_created] [nvarchar] (20) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N'') ) ON [PRIMARY]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[w2_DefaultSetting] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_w2_DefaultSetting] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED( [shop_id], [classification] ) ON [PRIMARY]
END
